item.title: "杀手真菌 "听起来像是科幻小说，但真菌感染每年造成全球约 170 万人死亡，比肺结核或疟疾的死亡人数还多。
item.description:
"Killer fungus" may sound like science fiction, but fungal infections kill an estimated 1.7 million people worldwide per year — more than tuberculosis or malaria. https://t.co/7TPnAS7KHg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：曼哈顿检察官办公室以新披露的证据为由，要求推迟对前总统特朗普封口费案的开庭审理。

item.title: 副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）将于周四访问明尼苏达州的一家堕胎诊所，据信这是任何总统或副总统的首次此类访问。
item.description:
Vice Pres. Kamala Harris is visiting an abortion clinic in Minnesota on Thursday, a trip believed to be the first of its kind for any president or vice president. https://t.co/vnx3LK2mEI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 联邦上诉委员会驳回了特朗普前顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）为推翻藐视国会的定罪而提出的避免入狱的请求。
item.description:
A federal appeals panel has rejected former Trump adviser Peter Navarro's bid to avoid reporting to prison as he works to overturn his contempt of Congress conviction. https://t.co/jEzqXo7bX6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）周四表示，该公司的 "星际飞船 "火箭在印度洋上空重返大气层时失去了联系，但第三次试飞仍被认为是成功的，因为它比之前的任何一次试飞都更进一步。
item.description:
SpaceX lost contact with its Starship rocket on reentry over the Indian Ocean, the company said Thursday, but the third test flight was still deemed a success as it advanced further than either of the previous tests. https://t.co/k8xt08r1tn pic.twitter.com/xekrV8v2lL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国海军陆战队的一支反恐精锐部队乘直升机进入海地太子港，帮助保护美国大使馆的安全。尽管一场暴力帮派起义动摇了这个加勒比国家的现任政府，但美国大使馆依然开放。
item.description:
An elite, anti-terrorism unit of the U.S. Marines choppered into Port-au-Prince, Haiti, to help secure the U.S. embassy that remains open despite a violent gang uprising that has shaken the incumbent government of the Caribbean country. https://t.co/S8MWts6f2B pic.twitter.com/CnHtuQ6QrK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据当地官员称，一名警长周日清晨在纽约巴达维亚唐斯博彩酒店（Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel）制止一起纠纷时遇袭身亡，目前已有两人被捕。
item.description:
Two arrests have been made following the death of a sergeant who was attacked and killed after breaking up a dispute early Sunday morning at New York’s Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel, according to local officials. https://t.co/UJHkSERmUF pic.twitter.com/OP0oDFXh0Y

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 随着围绕凯特-米德尔顿的照片争议持续发酵，关于一张全家福照片编辑时间的新细节也浮出水面，由于担心照片被 "操纵"，这张照片后来被全球新闻机构撤回。
item.description:
As the photo controversy around Kate Middleton continues to grow, new details have emerged about the timing of edits on a family photo that was later retracted by global news agencies amid concerns it was "manipulated." https://t.co/kmgaka9wnL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 女演员奥利维亚-蒙恩（Olivia Munn）公开了她与乳腺癌近一年的私下斗争，并透露她接受了四次手术，包括双乳切除术。
item.description:
Actress Olivia Munn is opening up about her nearly year-long private battle with breast cancer, revealing she underwent four surgeries, including a double mastectomy. https://t.co/VAyGDcCXOY pic.twitter.com/0edFbN2CTd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 贾斯汀-汀布莱克（Justin Timberlake）不仅在即将发行的专辑中与 *NSYNC 重聚，还在周三晚于洛杉矶举行的演出中登台亮相。

item.title: 据官方消息，周四上午，一辆联邦快递半挂车在纽约皮茨福德（Pittsford）翻车，造成包括一名婴儿在内的五人受伤。
item.description:

item.title: 独家：消息人士告诉美国广播公司新闻（ABC News），佛罗里达州众议员马特-盖茨（Matt Gaetz）在一起民事诉讼中被传唤出庭作证，该诉讼涉及他与一名17岁少女发生性关系的指控。

item.title: 据一家全球通讯社报道，在一张威尔士王妃凯特和她的孩子们的照片因编辑问题被撤回后，肯辛顿宫不再被视为可信的消息来源。
item.description:
Kensington Palace is no longer considered a trusted source, according to one global news agency, after a photo of Kate, the Princess of Wales, and her children was retracted due to editing concerns. https://t.co/wfer47Cdi4

item.title: 市场报告显示，美国经济的就业人数强劲，通货膨胀率也在下降，但一些小企业主告诉 @ABC News，他们仍然感觉到了压力。
item.description:
Market reports show the U.S. economy is seeing strong job numbers and a waning inflation rate — but some small business owners tell @ABC News they are still feeling the pinch. https://t.co/gFCcAwv3TI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 新消息：众议院司法委员会主席吉姆-乔丹（Jim Jordan）威胁富尔顿县地方检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）说，如果威利斯不遵从国会传票的要求，他将藐视国会，该传票是委员会调查富尔顿县地方检察官办公室的一部分。
item.description:
NEW: House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan has threatened Fulton County DA Fani Willis with contempt of congress if Willis does not comply with a congressional subpoena as part of the committee's investigation into the Fulton County DA's office. https://t.co/mqYMPPQNqp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）周四表示，他向共和党会议传达的信息是 "团结一致 "和 "完成任务"，以扩大众议院的多数席位--这是该党派在大选年的首要任务，因为在今年，该党派在众议院的多数席位非常稀少。
item.description:
House Speaker Mike Johnson said Thursday that his message to the GOP conference is to "stick together" and "get the job done" to expand the House majority — a priority in an election year where the party has a razor-thin House majority. https://t.co/3L4RQbh0WH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 新泽西州的参议员竞选为选民提供了一个选择：一位国会议员、一位第一夫人，还有可能是一位因腐败指控而被起诉但却矢口否认的现任参议员。

item.title: 在竞争对手乔-拜登（Joe Biden）抓住本周早些时候特朗普提出可能削减社保的言论不放之后，美国前总统特朗普在一次新的采访中试图明确表示，他 "绝不会做任何危害或损害社保或医疗保险的事情"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump sought to make clear in a new interview that he will "never do anything that will jeopardize or hurt Social Security or Medicare" after rival Joe Biden seized on comments earlier this week in which Trump floated potential cuts. https://t.co/ztPp7xwA5f

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 埃博拉疫情在西非造成一万多人死亡，加剧了该地区的经济和政治问题，利比里亚人本周聚集在一起，纪念该国遭受埃博拉疫情袭击十年。
item.description:
Liberians gathered this week to mark a decade since the country was hit by a devastating Ebola outbreak that killed more than 10,000 people in West Africa, adding to the region’s economic and political troubles. https://t.co/Fyy0rLxYkG

item.title: 参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）周四呼吁以色列举行新的选举，他认为以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）已经 "迷失方向"，是该地区和平的障碍。
item.description:
Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer on Thursday called on Israel to hold new elections, saying he believes Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu has "lost his way" and is an obstacle to peace in the region. https://t.co/hIsG5AjO3j

item.title: 拜登政府官员周四宣布，拜登政府将向部落政府拨款 1.2 亿多美元，用于应对气候变化的影响。
item.description:
